type ls -l /var/lib/dpkg/lock   and paste the results here,
you may just need to delete that lock file
you can try              sudo rm /var/lib/dpkg/lock
result: -rw-r----- 1 root root 0 2007-09-29 10:52 /var/lib/dpkg/lock
good, delete that file,     sudo rm /var/lib/dpkg/lock
then run sudo apt-get update again
